description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 21/04/2028 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This solicitation is for Aircraft Charter Services. Multiple versions of this event have been posted, please only submit one bid.

full_summary:
=================
### Aircraft Charter Services

#### Reference Number
WS3753315787-Doc3761322825

#### Solicitation Number
WS3753315787

#### Amendment Number
2

#### Tender Notice Publication Date
2022-12-16

#### Tender Closing Date
04/21/2023, 14:00:00 (EST)

#### Amendment Date
04/17/2023

#### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-06-01

#### Expected Contract End Date
None

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Procurement Category
SRV (Service)

#### Notice Type
Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

#### Contracting Organization
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Tender Description
This tender is for Aircraft Charter Services. Multiple versions of this event have been posted, please only submit one bid. For further information visit http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14739389 for English or http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14739389 for French. Please note that only the following regions are eligible for this tender: Canada.

#### Contact Information
Name: Kingsley Glover
Email: kingsley.glover@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Address: Not provided

#### Important Notes
- All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 04/21/2023, 14:00:00 (EST) to be considered valid.
- Bids submitted after the deadline will be declared non-responsive.
